name: E.D.D.I.E
description:
A game developed by Alex de la Cour and Jan Huss for the Wowie Game Jam 2022. 

Meet our Exceptionally Destructible, Dysfunctional and Indecisive Electronics or E.D.D.I.E. for short.

Designed to study the survival skills of a fragile little android with a heart of gold and little to no discernible decision making capabilities, the developers became far too preoccupied with whether they could, to consider whether they should.

It is up to you to keep poor E.D.D.I.E. alive and help him escape his malevolent creators!

Have you got what it takes?

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Best Played in full screen
